abstract: Federal regulators gave BP a permit to drill a new well in the Gulf of Mexico, the first time the oil company will be allowed to drill there since the Deepwater Horizon disaster in April 2010.
snippet: Federal regulators gave BP a permit to drill a new well in the Gulf of Mexico, the first time the oil company will be allowed to drill there since the Deepwater Horizon disaster in April 2010.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration on Wednesday gave BP its first drilling permit in the Gulf of Mexico since the Deepwater Horizon rig exploded in April 2010.

headline.main: BP to Drill Again in the Gulf of Mexico
